title: The Story so far: Sidetrack Theatre presents Kin
brief_description: Follows Sidetrack Theatre as it tours secondary schools, presenting the play Kin. Kin is a group devised piece of theatre which focuses on issues relevant to multiculturalism and explores many of the tensions that exist in young Australian society. Teacher resource notes are included.
